snippet: Apple Inc is planning additional steps to keep hackers out of user accounts in the face of the recent celebrity photo scandal, but denied that lack of security allowed intruders to post nude photographs of celebrities on the Internet, the Wall Str...

headline.print_headline: Apple to Add Security Alerts for iCloud Users, Says Cook: WSJ
headline.main: Apple to Add Security Alerts for iCloud Users, Says Cook: WSJ

lead_paragraph: Apple Inc is planning additional steps to keep hackers out of user accounts in the face of the recent celebrity photo scandal, but denied that lack of security allowed intruders to post nude photographs of celebrities on the Internet, the Wall Street Journal reported.
